dc_title_s: Snow Emergency Yale Tags 2019: City of Minneapolis, Minnesota
dc_description_s: This is the information about the number and location of tags (parking tickets) during this snow emergency.  Tag data will be retained for all Snow Emergencies in each snow season, until there is five full seasons of snow emergencies. Disclaimer: At this point we only have the tag data enclosed for day 2 and day 3 the snow emergencies. Day 1 tag data is collected manually and is not available at this time electronically.There is also an expected address error rate of between 5 and 10 percent.Snow Emergency Tags   2018/2019 Season #4 Yale (2/20/19 thru 2/22/19) Field NameField TypeField DescriptionFIDObject IDObject IDCitation_NText254Citation NumberAddressText 254Address of the citationLatitudeNumericX Coordinate - GeocodeLongitudeNumericY Coordinate - GeocodeNeighborhoText 254Neighborhood LocationCommunityText 254Community LocationWardText 254Ward LocationDay_IDNumericSnow Emergency Day IdentifierDateDateCitation DateCodeText 254Snow Emergency Parking OrdinanceDescriptioText 2Snow Emergency Parking Ordinance DescriptionTow_DistDouble 15Tow Districts Identifier
